QuestionTxt: (I would like to get your opinion on several areas of important government activities.) As I read each one, please tell me if you would like to see the government do more, do less, or do about the same as they have been on...Controlling the activities of large companies
SubPopulation: Asked of half sample of national adult sample (N = 1073)
SourceDoc: General Electric Quarterly Survey - National adult sample
SampleDesc: National adult, including an oversample of 333 Black Americans
